sentence: 34 ||| Statistical Methods ||| 5.1 ||| The sample size estimate of 1152 patients considered the assumptions: SiDBP differences of 3.5 mm Hg, standard deviation of the difference of 8 mm Hg, two-sided significance level of 0.050, power of 80%, and a 15% dropout rate.
label: po.Size

sentence: 20 ||| Patients and Methods ||| 2.5 ||| Patients assigned to ER felodipine 20 mg and/or ER metoprolol succinate 400 mg received half doses for 1 week before escalation to the full dose.
content: Patients assigned to ER felodipine 20 mg and/or ER metoprolol succinate 400 mg received half doses for 1 week before escalation to the full dose
label: i.Procedure

sentence: 83 ||| Statistical Methods ||| 5.50 ||| Fatigue in patients receiving high-dose (400 mg) ER metoprolol succinate in combination with medium-to high-dose (10 and 20 mg) ER felodipine was relatively common (20% for 10/400 mg and 18% for 20/400 mg, and 2% to 9% for the other treatment groups).
content: Fatigue in patients receiving high-dose (400 mg) ER metoprolol succinate in combination with medium-to high-dose (10 and 20 mg) ER felodipine was relatively common (20% for 10/400 mg and 18% for 20/400 mg, and 2% to 9% for the other treatment groups).
label: i.SS

sentence: 93 ||| Discussion ||| 6.1 ||| The M-FACT findings confirm that metoprolol succinate ER and felodipine ER both lower BP in a dose-dependent fashion in a hypertensive US population.
content: metoprolol succinate ER and felodipine ER both lower BP in a dose-dependent fashion in a hypertensive US population
label: o.Patient

sentence: 100 ||| Discussion ||| 6.8 ||| Thus, expanded combinations could provide treating physicians with an even wider range of effective treatments.
content: expanded combinations could provide treating physicians with an even wider range of effective treatments.
label: o.Treatment

sentence: 76 ||| Statistical Methods ||| 5.43 ||| Subgroup analyses of sitting BP based on age (Ͻ65 years versus Ն65 years), ethnicity (African American versus non-African American), sex, and a diagnosis of diabetes failed to identify significant treatment by subgroup interactions; however the power of the test was low given the many subgroups, some with small sample sizes.
content: Subgroup analyses of sitting BP based on age (Ͻ65 years versus Ն64 years), ethnicity (African American versus non-African American), sex, and a diagnosis of diabetes
label: i.Disease

sentence: 19 ||| Patients and Methods ||| 2.4 ||| After the placebo run-in, patients meeting BP criteria were randomized to one of the 16 treatment groups.
content: patients meeting BP criteria were randomized to one of the 16 treatment groups
label: i.Procedure

sentence: 26 ||| Patients ||| 3.5 ||| To maintain blinding, patients received 6 active or placebo tablets or both each morning, packaged according to a double-dummy dosing scheme.
content: patients received 6 active or placebo tablets or both each morning, packaged according to a double-dummy dosing scheme
label: i.Procedure
